thread.title: BRIEF-Google Says Its Project Zero Security Team Last Year Discovered Vulnerability Affecting Modern Microprocessors - Blog‍​

title: BRIEF-Google Says Its Project Zero Security Team Last Year Discovered Vulnerability Affecting Modern Microprocessors - Blog‍​
text:
January 4, 2018 / 12:33 AM / Updated 2 hours ago BRIEF-Google Says Its Project Zero Security Team Last Year Discovered Vulnerability Affecting Modern Microprocessors - Blog‍​ Reuters Staff 
Jan 3 (Reuters) - Google - 
* GOOGLE SAYS LAST YEAR ITS PROJECT ZERO SECURITY TEAM DISCOVERED VULNERABILITY AFFECTING MODERN MICROPROCESSORS - BLOG‍​ 
* GOOGLE SAYS ALL G SUITE APPLICATIONS BEEN UPDATED TO PREVENT ALL KNOWN ATTACK VECTORS RESULTING FROM CHIP VULNERABILITY - BLOG‍​ Source text : bit.ly/2lRQikY
